SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: THE UNFI FOUNDATION IS COMMITTED TO INSPIRING BETTER FOOD SYSTEMS AND NURTURING EVERYDAY HEALTH IN OUR COMMUNITIES. WE SUPPORT ORGANIZATIONS THAT: INCREASE THE SUPPLY OF ORGANIC FOOD (5 ENTITIES AND $115,000); IMPROVE ACCESS TO FRESH, HEALTHY FOOD FOR VULNERABLE POPULATIONS (32 ENTITIES AND $791,500); AND, ADVANCE CHILDHOOD NUTRITION EDUCATION (7 ENTITIES AND $130,000).

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: AN APPLICATION FORM IS AVAILABLE ONLINE TO BE COMPLETED THROUGH THE GRANT MANAGEMENT SOFTWARE AND IS UPLOADED ELECTRONICALLY. THE APPLICANT'S IRS DETERMINATION LETTER OR A CERTIFICATION OR OPINION FROM LEGAL COUNSEL REGARDING THEIR CLASSIFICATION MUST ACCOMPANY THE APPLICATION. THE APPLICATION REQUIRES INFORMATION ABOUT THE APPLICANT, THE PURPOSE OF THE GRANT REQUEST, THE AMOUNT REQUESTED, THE IMPACT THE GRANT WILL HAVE ON THEIR MISSION, AND THE TIME LINE THE GRANT WILL COVER. OTHER MATERIALS MAY BE SUBMITTED TO ENHANCE THE APPLICATION.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.SubmissionDeadlinesTxt: CURRENTLY NO DEADLINES FOR APPLICATION. APPLICATIONS ARE ACCEPTED AS LONG AS FUNDS ARE AVAILABLE.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: APPLICANTS ARE RESTRICTED TO U.S. ENTITIES THAT INCREASE THE SUPPLY OF SUSTAINABLY PRODUCED FOOD, IMPROVE ACCESS TO FRESH HEALTHY FOOD, PROVIDE HUNGER RELIEF FOR VULNERABLE POPULATIONS, AND ADVANCE CHILDHOOD NUTRITION EDUCATION.

GeneralExplanationGrp.MediumExplanationTxt: TAXPAYER IS AMENDING THE FORM 990-PF IN ORDER TO PROPERLY REFLECT THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS THAT WERE ISSUED AFTER THE ORIGINAL RETURN WAS FILED. AS A RESULT OF THE ADJUSTMENTS MADE DURING THE FINANCIAL STATEMENT AUDITING PROCESS THE FOLLOWING LINES WERE CHANGED:FORM 990-PF PART I LINE 1 - REFLECTS CORRECTED CONTRIBUTIONS AS A RESULT OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.FORM 990-PF PART I LINE 11 - REFLECTS CORRECTED OTHER INCOME AS A RESULT OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.FORM 990-PF PART I LINE 23 - REFLECTS CORRECTED OTHER EXPENSES AS A RESULT OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.FORM 990-PF PART I LINE 27 - REFLECTS CORRECTED NET LOSS A RESULT OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.FORM 990-PF PART II LINE 9 - REFLECTS CORRECTED PREPAID EXPENSES AS A RESULT OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.FORM 990-PF PART II LINE 28 - REFLECTS CORRECTED NET ASSETS AS A RESULT OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.FORM 990-PF PART III LINE 6 - REFLECTS CORRECTED NET ASSETS AS A RESULT OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.FORM 990-PF PART XI LINE 1 - REFLECTS CORRECTED AMOUNTS PAID TO ACCOMPLISH CHARITABLE PURPOSES AS A RESULT OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.FORM 990-PF PART XII LINE 4 - REFLECTS CORRECTED AMOUNTS PAID TO ACCOMPLISH CHARITABLE PURPOSES AS A RESULT OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.FORM 990-PF PART XII LINE 4E - REFLECTS CORRECTED REMAINING AMOUNT DISTRIBUTED OUT OF CORPUS AS A RESULT OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.FORM 990-PF PART XII LINE 6A - REFLECTS CORRECTED CORPUS AS A RESULT OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.FORM 990-PF PART XII LINE 9 - REFLECTS CORRECTED EXCESS DISTRIBUTIONS CARRYOVER TO 2022 AS A RESULT OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.FORM 990-PF PART XV-A LINE 9 - REFLECTS CORRECTED NET LOSS FROM SPECIAL EVENTS AS A RESULT OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.SCHEDULE B - REFLECTS THE CORRECTED CONTRIBUTIONS REPORTED BY QUALIFIYING CONTRIBUTORS AS A RESULT OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

OtherIncomeDetail.Desc: GROSS INCOME FROM SPECIAL FUNDRAISING EVENTS
